Segment.name: BGP
Segment.comment: To provide identifying numbers associated with the creation and maintenance of Interline Service Management problem logs

Field.name: TransactionSetPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

Field.name: ProblemLogReasonCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the reason a problem log was created

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: EquipmentInitial
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: DateTimePeriod
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: StandardPointLocationCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard Point Location) defined by National Motor Freight Tariff Association (NMFTA) or the Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA) point development group as the official code assigned to a city or point (for ratemaking purposes) within a city

SyntaxNote.name: P0304
SyntaxNote.comment: If either BGP03 or BGP04 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0506
SyntaxNote.comment: If either BGP05 or BGP06 is present, then the other is required.
